description: Detects possible execution via LNK file accessed on a WebDAV server.
author: Micah Babinski
name: Potentially Suspicious WebDAV LNK Execution
query: (event.category:process AND process.parent.executable:/.*\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.executable:(/.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*\\[Dd][Aa][Vv][Ww][Ww][Ww][Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]\\.*/)
